thread.title: Michael Buble's sister-in-law insists Noah is 'doing well' following cancer treatment
thread.title_full: Michael Buble's sister-in-law insists Noah is 'doing well' following cancer treatment

title: Michael Buble's sister-in-law insists Noah is 'doing well' following cancer treatment
text:
Michael Buble's sister-in-law insists Noah is 'doing well' following cancer treatment Michael Buble's sister-in-law insists Noah is 'doing well' following cancer treatment THE sister-in-law of singer Michael Buble has spoken out about his son Noah's progress after he was diagnosed with cancer last year. PUBLISHED: 08:28,   INSTAGRAM The sister-in-law of Michael Buble has insisted that his son Noah is 'doing well' 
Nutritionist Daniela Lopilato, who is the sister of Michael's wife Luisana, posted a tweet last night after an Argentinian journalist claimed he had spoken to her. 
"Don’t use my name in the media with information and things that I haven’t said. Noah is doing well and his parents will speak when they want to," she wrote on her Twitter page, which has 36.6k followers. 
Earlier that day, Tomas Dente alleged that Daniela had told him: "The cancer has gone," after he contacted her for an update on the three-year-old's condition. No usen más mi nombre en los medios con detalles y cosas q no dije. Noah está bien y los papas hablaran cuando ellos quieran! Gracias! — Lic.Daniela Lopilato (@NutriLopilato) February 2, 2017 Michael Bublé and his family Wed, November 9, 2016
